Notes.Text:
This update for firebird fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-11509: authenticated remote code execution via the definition external functions that don't match the
  original definition of the entry point (bsc#1087421).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: An authenticated remote attacker can execute arbitrary code in Firebird SQL Server versions 2.5.7 and 3.0.2 by executing a malformed SQL statement.
